lines.text: You see, Markham, we have all of the parts of the puzzle, but none of them seems to fit.

[after examining Coe's body]
Gentlemen, this man had been dead for some time when the bullet entered his head.
How long has he been dead?
Well, I'd say about eight to ten hours, but give me a chance to do a little carvin'.

[about the dead Archer Coe]
There couldn't have been much of a struggle. His hair isn't even mussed.

[Sardonically]
Somebody must have blackjacked him and then combed his hair.
Suicide?
All I know is he's dead, and there's still too many people in the world.

[Sniffing the aroma of the lipstick from the back of his hand]
Gardenia, I should say. Definitely common. Do you know anything about lipstick, Ryan?

[Taking offence]
What do you think I am?
Hmmm... I'll let you know.

[Annoyed, as Vance is leaving]
Okay, wise guy, you're not out of the woods yet!
You're right, Ryan.

[Referring to Vance's secret mission]
... and you understand the American government must not enter into this.
I know. If I'm caught, I shall be a man without a country.
More than that, Vance. Possibly also a man without a head!
Hmmm, not an amusing thought, your excellency.

[Approaching Grassi's table as he is eating]
Signor Grassi?

[Looking up]
Yes.
The same Signor Grassi who distinguished himself in the Ethiopian campaign?
The same.
I hope you'll pardon the intrusion. My name is Philo Vance.
Oh, uh, won't you join me? I've heard of you too.
Have you also heard that Mr. Archer Coe, whose airplane designs you've tried to buy for your government has been murdered?

[Shocked]
Murdered?
Yes, stabbed in the back! And the dagger's been a favorite Latin weapon since Nero played with matches!

[after being called for the third time]
I'd like to rent a room here until they finish this case.

[as they are entering the front doo]
By the way, Philo, how was the weiner schnitzel over there?
Hmmm, mostly bread and water!

[Finding no knife hole in the robe Coe was apparently stabbed in]
This complicates things a bit.
Hunh?
You still think it was suicide?
It's clear he couldn't have slugged, shot, and stabbed himself... particularly in the back.
